field.label: Show Add To Cart in Linked Products
Show Custom Block on Product Page
field.comment: You can add custom block in various locations on product page. After that add your instagram widget and any custom content to this block in order to show product related instagram posts or simply instagram gallery.

field.label: Custom Block Position on Product Page
Custom Block Content
field.comment: You can add instagram widget here. Choose "Show Product related posts only" to show only instagram posts linked to specific product on product page.

field.label: Enable Second Column/Content Block
field.comment: Enable/Disable to swtich between two and one columns layout.

field.label: Width of a First Content Block
field.comment: Percent(%) value for Width of the first custom block for desktop. Set value between 10 and 75, number only. Default is 55. Use this option to add responsive block size in %. The rest of the space will be used by second content block.

field.label: Custom Block 2 Content
field.comment: Add any Text/HTML here. Tags are allowed.

field.label: Align to center blocks vertically
field.comment: When two content block are enabled, block with shortest content will be aligned to center relatively to the second(tallest) block. For desktop only.

field.label: Show Second block first on mobile
Enable Dynamic Css
field.comment: If disabled, most of the theme appearace options like colors, fonts will not work. Only settings which are not creating custom css will still work (e.g.: enable/disabled options; icons, arrows, dots styles).

field.label: Save Dynamic Css Inline
field.comment: If disabled styles will be saved in file. Because dynamic css file is loaded after main styles, you can see appearance jump from default styles on slow connections.

field.label: Add version to Url for dynamic CSS
field.comment: Enable this option to create dynamic css with unique name each time you click save. In this case your website visitors will load new styles even if they were cached.

field.label: Overlay Color
field.comment: Image overlay color for grid layouts which usually appear on hover. Show Image Overlay should be enabled in widget.

field.label: Media Background Color
field.comment: Background color for media (image/video/carousel) in feed.

field.label: Media Icons Color
field.comment: Video play icon, media type icons (album, video) in grid.

field.label: Slider Arrows Background Color on Hover
Album Item Slider Arrows Background Color
Album Item Slider Arrows Color on Hover
Album Item Slider Arrows Background Color on Hover
Album Item Slider Dots Color Active
Button Border Color*
field.comment: Depends on theme design

field.label: Modal max width
field.comment: Number only. Default value is 940.

field.label: Modal edges roundness (Border Radius)
field.comment: Zero for square shape.

field.label: Media Icons Color
field.comment: Video play icon

field.label: Media Block Right Border Color
field.comment: A divider between media and info columns. Can be useful for images with white background

field.label: Next/Prev Post Arrows Color on Hover
Next/Prev Post Arrows Background Color on Hover
Slider Arrows Background Color on Hover
Products Add to Cart Icon Color
Products Add to Cart Icon Color, Hover
Products Add to Cart Background, Hover
Products Wishlist Button Icon Color, Hover
Products Actions Edges Roundness (Border Radius)
field.comment: Add to cart, Wishlist. Zero for square shape.

field.label: Products Image Edges Roundness (Border Radius)
field.comment: Zero for square image shape. Half of the image height/widht for circle image shape

field.label: Custom CSS
field.comment: Add your custom css style here.

field.label: License Key
field.comment:
Register

Enter purchase code and click Save Config button above to register theme on current domain.

One purchase code per one Domain/Magento installation.

 

Deregister

After you registered domain you can deregister it and use same purchase code to register module on another domain. To do this you need to remove purchase code from this field (leave it empty) and click Save Config button. You should do this before migrate to another domain name/magento installation.

More Info

How to manage License Keys?
